Title: Relates to creating tax parity by imposing an eight and one-half percent tax on all combative sport event ticket sales
Summary: Relates to creating tax parity by imposing an eight and one-half percent tax on all combative sport event ticket sales.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to creating tax parity by imposing an eight and one-half percent tax on all combative sport event ticket sales
